mapper.select: SELECT pcom_tbl.pid, pcol_tbl.pcid, pcol_tbl.pcchipimg, pcol_tbl.pccolorcode, pstock_tbl.psid, pstock_tbl.psstock, pstock_tbl.psize FROM product_stock pstock_tbl JOIN product_color pcol_tbl ON pstock_tbl.pcid = pcol_tbl.pcid JOIN product_common pcom_tbl ON pcol_tbl.pid = pcom_tbl.pid where pcom_tbl.pid = #{pid}
